name: The Runners
description:
Take on the challenges of this brilliant new endless runner. Choose from a variety of characters and jump through their forever changing environments. Put your skills to the test!

Features:

-Simple but challenging gameplay

-Endless runner!

-Procedurally generated levels

-Increasing difficulty

-Compete to get the best highscore

-Original soundtrack

-Epic illustration

-Powerups to help avoid obstacles!
